alert.note: Alert for Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera; Northern High Plains; Southern High Plains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 12 at 8:43AM MST until February 13 at 3:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 35 to 55 mph, with gusts up to 80 mph, are expected. Isolated wind gusts approaching 95 mph are possible along and west of the United States Highway 89 corridor across the Blackfeet Nation. * WHERE...The foothills and plains adjacent to the Rocky Mountain Front, and Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera. * WHEN...Until 3 PM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Period of most intense winds are expected from between 9 PM this evening through 9 AM MST Monday.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera; Northern High Plains; Southern High Plains
